website_summaries.verdict: FIFA Soccer 13 on the Wii U might lack some of the series' latest tweaks, but it still plays an enjoyable and thoroughly rewarding game of football.
pros: Exciting and satisfying matchesTouch-screen management controls are a great addition, particularly in co-opExcellent presentation
cons: No EA Sports Football Club or Ultimate Team modesOlder physics engine causes some odd player interactionTouch-screen controls for passing and shooting interfere with the flow

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best multiplayer games on Wii U
customer_reviews.text: My two boys and I have thoroughly enjoyed FS13 for Wii U. It is no doubt one of the best games on the Wii, especially that allows multiplayer. I like how neat the commentators make it all sound so real. It is practically spot on on many levels. I also love how they fashioned the players to mimic the actual players. Eg. Drogba has better dribbling skills than other players. But he also falls too often - just like the real thing. More importantly, I like how the game makes my kids want to go out and play the game outside like Messi! They asked me to paint our lawn like a football pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This plays just like any other
customer_reviews.text: FIFA is FIFA. This plays just like any other. I thought the gamepad features were interesting in theory but they are very hard to incorporate into my style of play which is fast paced and eyes on the TV alone! Still gets played once in awhile and is in the upper half of Wii u games that I like
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the kids... they love playing it
customer_reviews.text: Order this, along with the new Donkey Kong(for my 5 year old), and 007(for my 14 year old). Both seem to mainly only play FIFA 13! Could have something to do with them finishing up their first year of team soccer. I've played a few times with them. The game has the 4 player option, so I've whooped them in a couple exhibition games, me vs them. Graphics look pretty good! And the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Malo

customer_reviews.title: Son Plays It All The Time
customer_reviews.text: My son has played football for years. This game has gotten him so interested in soccer that I belive he might change his primary sport of choice next year. He loves Real - Salt Lake and plays as that team on this game. He created a player that looks very much like him, gave him a number and plays as that character in all the games. It keeps his stats just like it does for all the players on team. This is truely an enjoyable game for my son. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: An awesome game
customer_reviews.text: I don't think people understand how much better this game looks on the Wii U than it does on the 360 or PS3. The graphics in this game are really quite incredible. I would say it's closer to the PS4 version than it is to the last gen consoles. Great gameplay, lots of fun, and really cheap. Who cares that it's a year old? Getting people to buy a new sports game every year when it has barely changed is nothing but a scam. (Granted there is no FIFA 14 for Wii U). Either way, get this game.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: Good sports title for Wii U
customer_reviews.text: I started playing soccer in a city league so I started to really get into watching soccer on TV and I even picked this game up. I heard its basically like FIFA 12 in terms of gameplay and graphics. Regardless I think the game is pretty good. There is an online community here for the FIFA Wii U owners so thats a plus. The gamepad can be used here for switching up formations and subbing players. You can even play with just the gamepad too.
customer_reviews.author: KaTzPJamas

customer_reviews.title: Bargain price at 12 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Very fun with friends. The game pad dynamic is terrible. You touch screen to score and it is garbage. The developers where slacking on this one. Seems rushed. With the pro controller it is very fun. I have only seen the game on the Wii before and this is a million times better. I expected more out of the Wii U. The graphics could be much better. Not nearly as good graphics as NEW 2K. For the money it's a bargain, like most Wii U games.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Fun at a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: This game has some unique features for the Wii U and the core experience of the Fifa series, its a shame they didn't release fifa 14 but it still brings hours of fun and enjoyment with friends, by yourself or online, the game runs smooth and for the price I definitely recommend it, besides its the only soccer game for wii u and its very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wii U owners.
customer_reviews.text: While an older game for the Wii U, it's a great game. Does a good job to include the unique Wiii U controller in a smart way.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Blast
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to manage the controls but once we did, it was a blast - BLAST!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good Game, but...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this game. However, it is a bit glitchy, and while I'm sure the newer versions are better (2014 and 2015), they are alas not being produced for the WiiU. Honestly, I think it's a bad decision by the company.

Sometimes I watch the game on the gamepad, sometimes I watch it on the TV. the announcers are excellent and the reviews for this game are terrible online. Don't believe everything you hear.

customer_reviews.title: misleading title
customer_reviews.text: The name is misleading. Apparently there is a difference between wii and wii (u). It was not clear and as a result my grandchildren were very disappointed at Christmas. The game would not work on a regular wii controller. It was not worth the difficulty of returning the game. I will chalk it up to experience but will not ever purchase another nintendo product.

product_meta.title: FIFA Soccer 13 - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo Wii UEA SPORTS delivers its best soccer game ever on a Nintendo console with award-winning gameplay and revolutionary new ways to play that bring players of all abilities together, making this the most accessible FIFA console game ever made. Innovations that utilize the Wii U GamePad put you on the pitch and immerse you in the action. Lift and look through the GamePad touch screen to aim the ball on set pieces and penalty kicks, then put the perfect curve on your shot and let it fly. Shake the GamePad to activate Touch Screen Shooting, removing the element of 'hit and hope' and allowing for pinpoint accuracy. Plus, connect and interact with friends like no other FIFA title.
feature_bullets: Award-winning Gameplay: Enjoy the award-winning FIFA franchise gameplay, optimized for Wii-U.
Lift and Look: See the game from the player's on-field perspective and enjoy creative new ways to take free kicks and penalties.
Shake and Shoot: Enjoy complete control of shooting - the most rewarding part of the game.
Tap and Tackle: Take control of a specific defender by tapping on the player using the touch screen, taking all the guess work out of auto switching.

Complete Control: Full Team Management Control on the GamePad lets you change formations, make subs, switch player positions, change every facet of a team's tactics, and even set man markers all without interrupting the game.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars188 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
